$description: CCUI 2.1 light theme typography tokens. Uses Open Sans for both headings and body text.

body.$description: Body font stack for CCUI 2.1 theme. Open Sans is a humanist sans-serif typeface with excellent legibility.
body.$value: Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

heading.$description: Heading font stack for CCUI 2.1 theme. Uses Open Sans for consistent typography across headings and body.
heading.$value: Open Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
